website_summaries.verdict: Swift 1.5 sneakers contain a classic silhouette that gives the nod to the past models of the eS brand. However, the similarity does not stop with the design. The familiar comfort, heel support, and board feel of eS skate shoes are still there along with their much-admired sturdiness.While these kicks don't come comfortable right out of the box, they feel downright amazing once broken in. The shoes also feature handy inner lace loops that have saved many a lace from getting torn right away.
pros: According to many eS Swift 1.5 reviews, the comfort in these kicks is exemplary
They've got enough padding to absorb landing primo, plenty of users have noted
Several testers love the "superb balance between support and board feel" of these shoes, and they highly recommend them for skating in
These low-top sneakers are durable and last a long time without tearing, state purchasers who skate daily
The board control is impressive, say a good number of eS Swift 1.5 users who wear tested these kicks
The style of eS Swift 1.5 shoes is "straight fire," a lot of people have remarked
A handful of customers have noted that the fit of eS Swift 1.5 shoes is on point, and the sizing is accurate
Some consumers have reported that these skate shoes are lightweight and flexible
A few individuals are pleased with the inner lace loops of the sneakers, which they say, have saved their laces for months
cons: These eS Swift 1.5 men's shoes take a little while to break in, some skaters have noted

customer_reviews.title: Order half size up
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend and he wears a 9.5 in all other shoes perfectly, these were pretty tight in the toe area and kinda pinch his feet. Didn’t send back because he loves the way they look, just can’t wear them for extended periods of time. Got a pair of puma shoes instead with a memory foam footbed that he loves, also 9.5. Just order a half size up and you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of skate shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable to skate in and start extra sticky on the board. The red in the red and black pair is a bit more maroon than I expected based on the picture and other es red products.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E.

customer_reviews.title: They are very nice shoes, and go well with a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave these shoes as a gift. The color looks a bit lighter than is shown online. They are very nice shoes, and go well with a lot of different outfits. My husband loves them. He receives a lot of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Em Gabby

customer_reviews.title: MY GRANDSON LOVES HIS NEW SNEAKERS/SKATEBOARD SHOES
customer_reviews.text: gRANDSON LOVES THEM. HIS FAVORITE SNEAKERS, WORN ON A TRIP TO CHICAGO TO SEE HAMILTON.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. First pair I got was the Blue with Gum Sole. Once I saw they made a black with gum sole, I had to get em! Nice fit, great for skating, stylish look too!
customer_reviews.author: Jon G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I wish they made shoes like this more often. They fit like old school skate shoes when skate shoes were made right!!
customer_reviews.author: anthony r. mickey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: They're a little different than I'm used to. But I like them. Light weight warm weather shoes.
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have always skated the ES Accel Slim and decided to try these. Very similar but last twice as long. Good board feel and protection. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: jamison conti

customer_reviews.title: Support the OG’s!
customer_reviews.text: es’ always coming through. Skated es’ in the 90’s and to this day always producing legit skateboarding shoes. Love em.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes from ES!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoe ever. Fits perfect. ES has always been a great shoe company for skaters. The quality is great and looks like it will hold well.
customer_reviews.author: Jon G

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are dope
customer_reviews.text: They are a little stiff, but great for skateboarding and super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ITs not worth 1 star shoe fell apart after 2 hours of wear.......
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson and the sole started peeling away form the shoe after only 2 hours of wear . no response from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love 'es
customer_reviews.text: Love 'es shoes, been skating with them since I was a kid. Now I'm in my 30s and they still have the quality and performance I expect. Ordered these Sunday and they arrived Wednesday. They fit perfectly and were way cheaper than any other site, including 'es website.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ES Men's Swift 1.5 Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: The new swift 1.5 is inspired by our rich 90’s tech heritage and is fully loaded with function and style. High quality 400Nbs cupsole for grip, flex and board feel. Iconic silicone és accent increases durability and dual lacing provides an option to avoid grip tape abrasion. The unique STI thermothane toe piece is made from a similar material to the urethane in your wheels and provides the perfect flick. Tongue stabilizers keep the foot snug and STI energy foam insoles provide 200 percent energy return and supreme comfort mesh quarter panels and tongue increase breathability. The swift is already a team favorite.
